preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN ( select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( 'Bridget Muyotcha', 'Viola Mudhe', 'Judith Chabvuta', 'Daphine Lingola' ) and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" ) AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Provider name for Enhanced adherence counselling");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Provider name for "Provider name for Enhanced adherence counselling"
